TopicTitle: What will you build once 1.0.5 drops?

Articles.Content:
I have ideas for using that new mk1 cockpit for a X-15. Also, I might update my SS1 with the junos, depending on how powerful they are.

What will you build?
First? Probably a space shuttle, then I'll promptly build a fighter and a cargo plane to carry 100+ tons with the new engines
The new cargo ramp is gonna have a wonderful life with me.
Top of my list is a new and improved low orbit space station over Kerbin, hopefully using the new contextual contracts to assemble it.
Small MkII based mini-ISRU Aerospike-powered Eve biome planehopper

SSSPTO's all day Everyday

(Single Stage Sea Plane To Orbit)

Redo all my SPH aircraft/spaceplane designs, update my shuttle to take advantage of the new "Vector" engine, explore some of the other parts and tweaks.

And take a look at seaplanes
two things... New shuttle and a Cargo plane...
Giant swimming base
Eh, probably a Laythe Space-shuttle-style cargo seaplane.
Tiny SSTOs and variants of the Space Shuttle. Also, with those tiny parts, a jetpack for Jeb.

I will see if I can make a functioning submarine that uses jet engines for underwater propulsion (until a bug fix makes that impossible). After that, my submarines will need to be rocket powered, which should still work.
Probably build something odd that makes use of the new wheel physics... What sort of contraption can I make? Wonder what it'll do to bearings.
new wheel physics will come only at 1.1.... I think...
gonna update my shuttle when it comes out with the new engines.
I plan to build a really, really big VTOL with the new Goliath engines. I've sketched up some design concepts, and I'm going to need at least 8 engines. Go big or go home
missile sub - been waiting a long time for practical subs. YOU CANT TOUCH ME! (also then i'll make torpedos)
Probably just keep tweaking my R-7s, which means I'll have to wait for all the mods to update first, which means I won't build anything once 1.0.5 drops.

I will build a rocket, and send it into space.

(not actually, just virtually)

Maybe conduct a lemming mission to Duna
X-COM skyranger. The reverse-thrust 2.5m engines plus the ability to afterburn the 1.25m engines are going to help with actually flying the thing, and the MK3 ramp is a must.
Space shuttle missions to other planets.
lots of planes
I will continue work on this huge project of mine. HOPEFULLY it will be done soon. I think some of the new parts can help with this.
Hyperedit up my 4 kilopart station
Everything.
